Posts.Content: Elizarose, You did say everything that I felt and sometimes still feel. I wish I could think of the right words to say. I think if I could it would help me to feel better. I get on here to look at what others write and I think, "OMGosh, that's just the way I feel." So "Thank you" for saying what I and I'm sure others feel at times. :):):):):):)smiles:):):):):):), and may God richly bless you, Reese
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...
A quote I thought I would share

Posts.Content: Meena, I can only imagine what you're going through. I'm like Jo Jo, I only know what my experience is. I will keep you in my thoughts and prayers. You are an inspiration to us all. Keep fighting.

Posts.Content: Laura, I will be praying for you. Reese
